Columbia.Canal Dime Savings Bank: Canal Dime Savings Bank, also known as Eckerd`s Drug Store, is a historic bank building located at Columbia, South Carolina. It was built between 1892 and 1895, and is a three-story, Romanesque Revival style brick building with a granite façade and red barrel tile roof. The building was purchased by Eckerd`s Drug Store in 1936.
